message.raw:
Added basic support for Image output types (for the SLM).

device_base_class has not been extended to support remote_value_checking for this output type
font_panel_settings has not been extended to support saving and loading of the front panel for these output types.

That said, I've added enough code to these classes so that blacs doesn't break when you have a device with Image outputs.

Requires labscript_utils changeset: 74e3a9328055
All changes made so far are backwards compatible with existing labscript_devices.
